CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Net Profit Margin?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Net Profit Margin is Customer Retention Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Net Profit Margin?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Net Profit Margin is Operating Cost Ratio.

SRP.Q: On the Net Profit Margin, is the point for Lewis Group inside or outside the point for Moses LLC?
SRP.A: On the Net Profit Margin, the point for Lewis Group is inside the point for Moses LLC.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Lewis Group?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {ROI}, while the weakest aspect is{ Operating Cost Ratio}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Net Profit Margin, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Net Profit Margin, label {Lewis Group} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Operating Cost Ratio, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Operating Cost Ratio, label {Lewis Group} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Lewis Group on the ROI in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Lewis Group on the Safety dimension is {82}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Moses LLC on the Net Profit Margin in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Moses LLC on the Safety dimension is {77}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Moses LLC across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Moses LLC across all dimensions is {53}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Lewis Group across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Lewis Group across all dimensions is {75}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Net Profit Margin
SC.A: The average value of Net Profit Margin is {70.5}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Moses LLC
SC.A: The average value of Moses LLC is {81.25}.

NF.Q: Which labels have scores below 82 for the Customer Retention Rate dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.
Which labels have scores above 74 for the Net Profit Margin dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.
For Lewis Group in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores between 78 and 95? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For Lewis Group, which dimension has a higher score: Customer Retention Rate or Operating Cost Ratio?
NC.A: {Customer Retention Rate} has a higher score than Operating Cost Ratio for Lewis Group.

NC.Q: On Net Profit Margin, which label has a higher score: Moses LLC or the Lewis Group?
NC.A: {Moses LLC} has a higher score on Net Profit Margin compared to Lewis Group.

NC.Q: On Operating Cost Ratio, which label has a higher score: Lewis Group or the Moses LLC?
NC.A: {Moses LLC} has a higher score on Operating Cost Ratio compared to Lewis Group.

NC.Q: For Moses LLC, which dimension has a higher score: Customer Retention Rate or Operating Cost Ratio or ROI?
NC.A: {Customer Retention Rate} has a higher score for Moses LLC.

MSR.Q: For Lewis Group, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Lewis Group most needs to improve its {Operating Cost Ratio}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Moses LLC}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Lewis Group}.
